      • isElement

        public static boolean isElement​(@Nonnull
                                org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                @Nullable
                                org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
                                @Nullable
                                String type)
        check the 'cpp:Element' type for a resource with an optional overloaded type
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for type check (if resource is null)
        resource - the resource (can be 'null' if type is available)
        type - the optional resource type (necessary if resource is 'null')

      • initializeWithResource

        protected void initializeWithResource​(@Nonnull
                                      org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Uses an explicit resource type determined by a template if present (static include of no existing resources) The type is used only if the resource is a non existing resource (in this case we need such a type hint). The type must be available as attribute '${EditServlet.EDIT_RESOURCE_TYPE_KEY}' of the request.
        Overrides:
        initializeWithResource in class AbstractModel
